articles.title: 高校外语学刊研究会1992年年会
articles.abstract: ＜正＞ 这次年会于5月27日至30日在南京郊外解放军国际关系学院举行。会员单位代表36人出席会议,上海外语教育出版社等五家出版社派员参加了这次会议。在理事会和东道主的精心安排下,四天的会议开得紧凑,开得成功。有5位代表作大会发言。

articles.title: 从国家间互动关系看中国内地与澳门高校葡语教育演变：对多元化路径的探讨
articles.author: 孙怡;宋灏岩;姚京明;
articles.abstract: This article combines studies of international relations and foreign language education and tries to establish a causal relationship between the "foreign language departments growth" and "relationship between China and target countries". It concludes that international relations have played roles of positioning, orientation, quantitative and qualitative configuration in building foreign language departments. This article focuses on the impacts of the interaction between China and Portuguese-speaking countries on the construction and development of Portuguese departments in the Chinese mainland and Macao. Based on recent development trends between these countries, the paper proposes a possible diversified education of Portuguese majors. It suggests that Portuguese-speaking majors should be cultivated with economic and trade expertise as well as cultural knowledge of the regions concerned, which can be better achieved by exploring the potentials for cooperation between mainland universities and Macao universities.

articles.title: 高校英语专业基础阶段课程设置讨论会在沪召开
articles.author: 曲静
articles.abstract: ＜正＞ 去年12月18日—20日在上海召开了基础阶段英语专业课程设置讨论会,出席会议的有北京大学、北京外国语学院、国际关系学院、上海外国语学院、上海师范学院、复旦大学、广州外国语学院、中山大学、辽宁大学、华东师范大学、南开大学、南京大学等十二所院校的代表。 会上,代表们就目前各校基础阶段英语课程设置的情况进行了交流,对基础阶段的划分、各门课程的目的要求及相互关系等问题进行了讨论,并对今后的课程设置提出了一些设想。

articles.title: 英语语法教学的过去和现在
articles.author: 刘世沐
articles.abstract: ＜正＞ 这一次,北京外国语学院英文系在党的领导下,在双反鸣放的基础上,根据院系党组织所提出的院系跃进规划,充分发动群众,尤其是青年教师和学生,进行了教学整改,制定了新的现代英语口笔语实习教学大纲。随着,在“十一”献礼工作中,结合新的教学大纲的要求,编写了各项教材和工具书,来保证大纲的贯彻执行。

articles.title: 俄罗斯人工智能发展的能力约束及参与全球价值链的困境评估
articles.author: 戢仕铭;
articles.abstract: In order to address the challenges brought about by a new round of scientific and technological revolution,Russia has developed a grand artificial intelligence development planning,and has formulated a "two-wheel drive"strategy for both policy promotion and priority in the military sphere. According to the analysis of Russian artificial intelligence value chain through basic elements of artificial intelligence development,Russia enjoys some basic advantages in the development of artificial intelligence. Due to long-standing separation of Russian industries from the global value chain and weaknesses in electronics industry and semiconductor industry,independent construction of Russian artificial intelligence value chain is extremely handicapped.Russia may continue to be marginalized in the future global artificial intelligence value chain.

articles.title: 新时期俄罗斯执政精英变迁及其对中俄关系的影响
articles.author: 刘莹;
articles.abstract: Russia’s diplomatic decision-making mechanism has obvious characteristics of elite politics. The pressure of the new situation of the political turmoil in Russia caused by the storm of parliamentary elections at the end of 2011 and the economic downturn caused by the deterioration of relations between Russia and the West after the Ukrainian crisis in 2014 forced the Putin government to adjust the members of the Russian ruling elite to consolidate the regime and reverse the declining tendency of the development of the national economy,however,the personnel changes did not affect the cores of power structure and diplomatic decision-making. On the basis of summarizing the characteristics of the changes of the ruling elite in Russia in the new period,this paper analyzes the core team of the Russian elite for the decision-making on China and their policy ideas from the two aspects: development of decision making and conceptual enlightenment. It also analyzes the characteristics of the implementation of Russia’s China policy by the Russian elite from two specific fields: Sino-Russian energy cooperation and subnational cooperation. The author believes that the current decision-making mechanism for Russian foreign policy with Putin as the core has not been fundamentally affected by the changes of the elite. The rise of the "China factor" in the concepts of the elite will help promote Sino-Russian cooperation; while the unpredictability of the political influence of the energy elite politics and the emergence of the phenomenon of "provincial affairs ministers"reflect the situation of the coexistence of challenges and opportunities for the development of Sino-Russian future relations.

articles.title: 当前欧亚国际移民治理:俄罗斯的经验蓝本
articles.author: 强晓云;
articles.abstract: In recent years,with the Silk Road Economic Belt,the Eurasian Economic Union and the Great Eurasian Partnership being put forward and implemented,transnational population migration within the Eurasian region shows new features.First,the direction and the center of the transnational population migration are all the more evident. The transnational population migration within the region consists mainly of labor migration and migration for education,and China and Russia have become the two centers of the international migration in Eurasia. Secondly,the transnational population migration synchronizes with Eurasian regional development,and the deepening of regional integration promotes the activeness of population migration. Thirdly,the migration to Russia is the most active part of population migration within Eurasia.Therefore,both the extent of the Russian society to accept immigration and the regulations of the Russian government concerning immigration exert an influence on the situation of the population migration within the area that cannot be ignored.

articles.title: 俄罗斯在亚太安全体系中的地位与作用
articles.author: 封帅;
articles.abstract: The historical logic of the interaction between Russia and the Asia-Pacific space has not changed fundamentally since the 1860s. In the eyes of Asian countries,Russia is an outsider of the Asia-Pacific space. In Russia’s own view,they represent the historical process of the expansion of European civilization to Asia. The identity of the "other"makes Russia participatein the Asia-Pacific security system as an external factor only. When the Russia’s comprehensive national strength surpasses those of the Asia-Pacific countries,it can become a balance force in the Asian-Pacific security system. But when it is in a weak position in the regional power structure,the Russia’s role in the Asia-Pacific security system declines in fashion of cliff fall,becoming a marginal role similar to Yevgeny Onegin who was in the system but could not integrate into the evolution process of the system. The history of Russia’s participating in AsiaPacific security affairs is such a tidal movement that swings back and forth between these two states. After the Cold War,Russia has entered a new round of the cyclein which it is in a weak position in the Asia-Pacific affairs,and it has gradually slid to the edge of the Asia-Pacific security system with significant decline of its national power and the imbalance of its power between the Eurasian space and the Asia-Pacific space. In this case,the Russian intellectual elite put forward the ideas of building an Asian identity,"Greater Eurasian Partnership,"strengthening bilateral cooperationwith the Asia-Pacific pivot countries and other coping strategies,but due to the constraints of its comprehensive national strength and the international environment,their effects are not evident yet,and Russia caught in the dilemma in the Asia-Pacific security system is difficult to make significant progresses in the near future.

articles.title: 俄罗斯入世及其影响
articles.author: 张健荣;
articles.abstract: 2011年俄罗斯加入世界贸易组织标志着其社会经济转型跨入了新的发展阶段,它结束了俄罗斯长期游离在世界贸易管理、组织、协调机制之外的局面,消除了国际市场对其出口的贸易歧视,享有了在世界贸易体系中的平等地位。这对促进和扩大俄罗斯对外贸易发展具有划时代意义。俄罗斯入世的承诺意味着其关税制度、产业经济、服务贸易的实质性转变,对俄罗斯经济发展是前所未有的考验。如何利用入世机遇,推进俄罗斯经济朝着多元化和现代化模式发展,是俄罗斯面临的主要任务。为了保证俄罗斯国内产业适应入世,政府制定了一系列政策,出台了相应的政府补贴措施。但是,这些措施依然面临诸多消极因素的干扰,影响着入世后俄罗斯产业经济的顺利过渡。

articles.title: 普京的俄罗斯政党制度发展设想与实践
articles.author: 汪宁;韦进深;
articles.abstract: 普京关于俄罗斯政党和政党制度的设想是普京新俄罗斯思想的重要内容。通过对普京两任总统任期、一任总理任期间俄罗斯政党制度发展的考察,文章认为,普京的政党制度设想和实践巩固并发展了俄罗斯的政党制度,使俄罗斯政治得以稳定,并逐渐朝着"两三个或四个政党"参加的多党制方向发展。文章进而指出,普京政党制度设想的形成、内容和实践与俄罗斯政党政治现实密切相关。

articles.title: 俄罗斯与欧亚地区形势回顾及发展趋势
articles.author: 刘军;崔雯怡;
articles.abstract: ＜正＞2021年的欧亚地区发生了一系列变化,经历了多重挑战。欧亚地区虽然经历了一系列的危机与风险,但总体局势仍在可控范围。一、2021年欧亚地区的总体形势回顾（一）俄罗斯国内形势在政治方面,2021年9月17～19日,俄罗斯举行了第八届国家杜马代表选举。执政党统一俄罗斯党大获全胜,占据了324个席位,维持了宪法多数。

articles.author: 赵华胜;
articles.abstract: ＜正＞2017年国际政治充满着不确定性,世界都在等待着变化的发生。2017年对俄罗斯应是好年景。趋势总体上对俄罗斯有利。一方面,俄罗斯渡过了最困难的阶段,俄罗斯更加自信;另一方面,欧洲自身问题重重,难民和恐怖主义使欧洲不堪重负,难以集中力量应付俄罗斯;而最主要的是特朗普就任美国总统,俄美

articles.title: 俄美关系前景与俄罗斯发展走向
articles.author: 冯玉军;
articles.abstract: ＜正＞自2013年11月乌克兰国内爆发政治动荡以来,乌克兰危机已经持续了两年多时间,其间的高潮是俄罗斯以"非常规战争"方式取得克里米亚和惨烈的乌克兰东部地区武装冲突。乌克兰危机使俄与西方关系陷入冷战以来最低点。2015年2月12日,由俄、乌、德、法4国领导人组成的"诺曼底四方"会谈在经历了长达16个小时的马拉松式会谈后通过一份宣言,支持乌克兰冲突调解进程。之后,联络小组又签署一

articles.title: 《里海法律地位公约》达成原因及影响研究
articles.author: 周明;翟化胜;
articles.abstract: Since the dissolution of the Soviet Union,the Caspian coastal countries have fallen into incessant debates over the legal status and the division of the Caspian Sea for more than 20 years. The Convention on the Legal Status of the Caspian Sea,signed at the Summit of the Caspian States（ the so-called "Caspian five"countries） on August 12,2018,puts an end to this situation temporarily. The signing of The Convention on the Legal Status of the Caspian Sea results from the compromises among the Caspian Sea countries under the new situations. The signature of this Convention not only lays a legal foundation for the establishment of a new system in the Caspian Sea region,but also will play an important role in the stability of the Caspian Sea region,the development and export of oil and gas resources and the maintenance of global energy security. Although the signature of this Convention demonstrates important positive significance,this Convention still implies some ambiguities on some key issues,such as the absence of specific and clear-cut dispute settlement solutions,the ambiguity of division rules for seabed and seafloor,etc. In conclusion,the signature of the Convention on the Legal Status of the Caspian Sea is of great significance,but it is not enough to resolve the Caspian Sea issue once and for all.

articles.title: 俄乌关系演变对欧亚联盟的影响
articles.author: 李燕;何宛昱;
articles.abstract: The Eurasian Union is one of the great visions of Russia’s revival strategy. In this strategic vision,Ukraine is a very important component. But the Ukraine crisis has changed this situation,and various discrepancies exposed in the crisis affected the stability of the Eurasian Union as well. In early 2015,the establishment of the Eurasian Economic Union was officially announced,and Ukraine announced to join the European Union Association Agreement two months later,leading Ukraine to move away from the Eurasian Union further. Seen from the perspective of Russia’s strategic choices,the Eurasian Union will move forward,regardless of whether Ukraine joins.However,the strategy will face many difficulties in the future because of the impact of the relationship between Russia and Ukraine.

articles.title: “开放型机制”与国家对规范制定的影响力——基于网络安全领域的研究
articles.author: 王蕾;
articles.abstract: It can be frequently witnessed that states promote norm emergence through creating a new institution. But whether the founder can always be the main beneficiary of the new institution is questionable. Russia pushed for the creation of United Nations Open-Ended Working Group（OEWG） to undertake the mission of norm-making for cyber security issues. However, the influence that Russia gained during the operation of the institution cannot compete with what the United States and its allies acquired.Through “open-ended institution” that has unlimited quota for participants, states under different conditions can acquire different types of influence. The main benefit for Russia to launch OEWG was being recognized by more states as the “leader” of an inclusive, open norm-making process, which led to the improvement of reputation. In order to maintain this benefit, Russia prioritized the task of making sure that the institution can complete its mission on schedule, rather than striving for more support for its norm proposals. This left the United States and its allies an opportunity to mobilize states and non-state actors to make their norm proposals more supported in practice.The two sides acquired different types of influence, which varied in significance for states to improve influence on norm-making. The research shows that combining the creation of new institution with mobilization of support for norm proposals is difficult but important.
info: (G) Politics/ Military Affairs/ Law; (I) Electronic Technology ＆ Information Science

articles.title: 俄乌冲突与美国代理人战争的走向
articles.author: 陈翔;
articles.abstract: Ukraine crisis is a major security issue of global concern.From the onset of the Ukraine crisis and civil war in 2014 until the outbreak of the Russia-Ukraine conflict in 2022,the United States has been pursuing proxy war against Russia in Ukraine,the total aim of which is to maintain its strategic interests in Europe and global hegemony by containing Russia.In this process,the specific goal of the America’s proxy war has been evolving from defeating the civilian armed forces in eastern Ukraine supported by Russia to dragging Russia into the“proxy war trap”.It should be noted that America’s proxy war in the Russia-Ukraine conflict has adjusted in some aspects,which is reflected in providing political and military assistance for Ukraine openly,waging proxy war through multilateral coalitions,and adopting mixed policy instruments.The trend of America’s proxy war in Ukraine is affected by domestic politics and support from allies,the battlefield capability of Ukraine and the countermeasures of Russia.Conflict is helpful for in-depth study and judgement of the future trend of the conflict.America’s proxy war in the Russia-Ukraine.

articles.title: 美俄在叙利亚的角逐
articles.author: 陶文钊;
articles.abstract: The Syrian Civil War is a typical proxy war between the US and Russia.The US and most western countries supported the Syrian rebels while Russia lent aid to the government led by Bashar Assad. The interests of the US and Russia came into conflict with each other in the Syrian Civil War. The political transition required by the Syrian opposition is in line with the interests and values of the US,but it will deprive Russia of its last stronghold in the Middle East. Therefore,Russia will continue to support Assad’s regime in order to retain this important stronghold in the Middle East and the Mediterranean region. However,it does not mean that the US and Russia do not have common interests,which can be mainly reflected in three aspects,namely anti-terrorism,ending humanitarian disasters and seeking a political solution to the civil war. Through "chemical weapons for peace"and military intervention in the Syrian Civil War,Russia gained the upper hand in the competition. Moreover,Russia played a key role in handling important events in the Middle East for the first time during the post-Soviet period and emerged from the shadow of the Crimean crisis to a certain extent.

articles.title: 中俄关系:新时代全面战略协作伙伴
articles.author: 赵鸣文;
articles.abstract: As the most important bilateral relationship among international relations,China-Russia relations play a significant role in maintaining international and regional peace and stability and balancing global strategies. After evolving to "comprehensive strategic partnership of coordination"from previous "strategic partnership of coordination"in 2011,China-Russia relations entered the "new stage of comprehensive strategic partnership of coordination"in 2014. In 2019,both Chinese and Russian presidents elevated the bilateral relationship to a higher level,"comprehensive strategic partnership of coordination for new era". Since then,both countries have had unprecedented political mutual trust and strategic cooperation,witnessing groundbreaking progresses in military and science ＆ technology,fruitful cooperation in economy,finance,energy,road infrastructures,agriculture,region affairs and culture. China and Russia kept cooperating with each other to contain the spread of COVID-19 pandemic. Although the relations still face numerous external challenges and internal issues,the internal driving force for the bilateral relationship is powerful. In the new era,both China and Russia will enhance their political mutual trust,improve the bilateral trade structure and investment environment,and strengthen the early-stage feasibility researches for relevant projects,so as to promote the in-depth development of comprehensive strategic partnership of coordination for new era.

articles.title: 国家构建、民主化回应与中亚政治稳定的形成
articles.author: 孙超;
articles.abstract: The literature on the nation building in Central Asia traditionally paid more attention to the building of the nation-states in Central Asia,neglecting the organic connections between the concentration of state power and the building of institutional legitimacy that is closely related with nation building,and even avoiding the analysis of the institutional adaptability of Central Asian countries responding to the external environment. The formation of political stability in Central Asia has benefited from the triangle of stable order,namely the concentration of power,the strategy of legitimacy and the flexible response to the wave of international democratization. Specifically,the Central Asian political elite quickly adapted to the democratic diffusion process in the international community; on this basis,they have cultivated a unique electoral culture to improve the power framework of a presidential system to accumulate institutional legitimacy,fostering new political nationality through the building of political communities. These factors have strongly contributed to the stability of the political order in Central Asia. This situation of stability will continue for a long time.

articles.title: “他者”观念视域下的西方世界对俄制裁
articles.author: 戚凯;
articles.abstract: When the Russia-Ukraine conflict broke out in February 2022,the U.S. and the West broke with their usual practice and escalated sanctions against Russia,causing global anxiety.The West has long viewed Russia as an inferior“other”on multiple levels,such as religion,political system,geography,and economic development.Around the Russia-Ukraine conflict,Russia has intensified its claim to its unique civilization and security concept,thus continuously challenging the Western centrist ideology and institutional foundation,which pushed the West to strengthen its containment of Russia to protect Western hegemony.The pernicious effects of the West’s hostility and harsh sanctions against Russia are spilling over,triggering concerns in both the Western and non-Western worlds and consequently starting their strategic adjustments.All the adjustment is contrary to the development needs of the globalization era.Meanwhile,it detached from the international reality of sovereign equality in the post-colonial period.Thus the world’s future is full of uncertainties and challenges.

articles.title: 美国学界对俄乌冲突的认知及其评析
articles.author: 杨庆龙;
articles.abstract: At present,the Russia-Ukraine conflict is becoming a hot research topic in academia at home and abroad.There are many research results about Russia-Ukraine conflict in American academia.Scholars have carried out in-depth studies around the causes,impacts,prospects and solutions.of the Russia-Ukraine conflict.Their views are quite varied and there are some profound insights in them.However,due to the influence of national interests,ideology and western strategic culture,there are still some obvious limitations in the views of the American academia on the Russia-Ukraine conflict.For example,there are much fewer scholars who believe that the eastward expansion of NATO leads to the Russia-Ukraine conflict than those who believe that the responsibility for the conflict should be attributed to Russia;Many scholars tend to see the Russia-Ukraine conflict from the analytic framework of the democracy vs.autocracy;There is lack of due criticism and reflection on the United States’hegemonism strategy,especially its policy towards Russia after the Cold War.The key to resolving the Ukrainian issue lies in the correct security concept and the establishment of an inclusive security order.

articles.title: 俄美关系发展的前瞻性分析
articles.author: 刘军;
articles.abstract: ＜正＞乌克兰危机尤其是克里米亚回归俄罗斯以来,俄罗斯与西方关系尤其是与美国关系陷入冷战结束后的最低谷。西方运用经济制裁、军事威胁、外交孤立等一系列全方位手段制衡俄罗斯,俄美关系重回冷战时期的两极对抗。普京治下的俄罗斯已完全丧失对美国的信任,坚信美国不可能真正平等对待并尊重俄罗斯,俄罗斯从心理上

articles.title: 中亚一体化的架构变化与发展前景
articles.author: 顾炜;
articles.abstract: The development of sub-regional integration is offected deeply by the region situation. Sub-regional countries,regional countries and extraterritorial countries serve as the main players in the integration process. Theoretically,sub-regional integration follows two goals and logics of "seeking survival"and "pursing development". Under the logic of "pursuing development",sub-regional integration runs ahead of regional integration from the perspective of maturity,and can maintain survival and set the pace for regional integration through sub-regional development. Under the logic of "seeking survival",sub-regional integration is outpaced by regional integration from the perspective of maturity. In order to avoid "being merged"by regional integration,it is advised to seek survival by uniting sub-regional countries,introducing new regional countries or leveraging the power of extraterritorial countries. While China become an Eurasian Countries,the external framework of Central Asian integration is reversed. Central Asian countries maintain solidarity and carry out cooperation,and make the best of the strengths of new regional country（ i. e.,China） and extraterritorial countries to seize the room for development of sub-regional integration in Central Asia. The development prospects of Central Asian integration depends on the logic application of "seeking survival"and the solutions to specific problems in Central Asian countries.

articles.title: 韩国“新北方政策”下的北极战略:进程与限度
articles.author: 郭锐;孙天宇;
articles.abstract: After ROK President Moon Jae-in took office,he included energy,the Arctic waterway and other contents into "9 Bridges"Strategy framework of "New Northern Policy". By strengthening China-ROK relations and Russia-ROK relations to unfreeze its relations with DPRK,Moon Jae-in pushes the concepts of "New Economic Map of Korean Peninsula"and the "Northeast Asia + Responsible Community". Under various considerations（ such as enhancing regional discourse power,promoting economic development and ensuring energy security）,Moon Jae-in Administration places priorities over participation in Russia’s Arctic energy development,contribution to commercialization of the Arctic waterway and construction of the Arctic logistics system within the framework of "New Northern Policy". In the meantime,the construction of "Polar Cities",with local governments as the backbone,has also become the focus of the grand planning. ROK’s Arctic Strategy is confronted with the challenges from a series of issues,such as the complication of the US-DPRK relations,homogenized competition between ROK and Japan and the militarization of the Arctic. Although Moon Jaein Administration has made great progress in vigorous launch of the Arctic Strategy,the implementation of this strategy has been greatly restricted.

articles.title: 内战、干预与国际秩序:重新审视乌克兰冲突
articles.author: 钟准;
articles.abstract: Civil wars and international interventions have become the main manifestation of the volatile international order,and the Ukraine crisis erupted in 2014 is such an example. This article analyzes the case of Ukraine from the three aspects. It begins with an analysis of the causes of the conflict by using the theory of security dilemma,arguing that the anarchy within Ukraine is the primary reason leading to the armed rebellion of ethnic Russians. The social mentality of hostility and fear,as well as the economic expectations of jeopardized interests,exacerbated the uncertainty and insecurity of both sides of the conflict. And geographical proximity to the foreign alliance provided an objective condition for the rebellion. It then analyzes the intervention roles played by the EU and Russia. The dilemma of Ukraine to choose an alliance between the West and Russia intensified its domestic conflict and led to the 2013 Crisis.From the perspective of keeping a balance of alliance politics,however,both the EU and Russia adopted a strategy of "conditionally supporting the alliance while abating the conflict". The final part evaluates the impact of the Ukraine conflict on the international order. Both the West and Russia have undermined the international order at different levels.

articles.title: 乌克兰危机对地区竞合及欧亚秩序的影响
articles.author: 顾炜;
articles.abstract: The Eurasian region is Russia’s traditional area of influence and also the focus of Russian diplomacy.The Ukraine crisis has changed the basic paradigm of competition and cooperation in the Eurasian region.Great power competition has transformed into multi-level agency competition.Regional institutional competition has been weakened,and partner competition has been increased.Bilateral cooperation and panregional cooperation received attention from all countries.Affected by the changes in the competition and cooperation of great powers,the recovery and development of the regional economy is constrained,the fragmentation and diversification of the regional order will continue.Although it once became the focus of global attention,the global status of Eurasian region has not fundamentally changed.The Ukraine crisis gives extraterritorial third parties an opportunity to expand their influence,and the Eurasian region will be further integrated with the larger surrounding areas.China should actively promote cooperation in the Eurasian region and strive to maintain the stability of the regional order.

articles.title: 乌克兰危机与土耳其能源战略地位的提升
articles.author: 苏春雨;
articles.abstract: The Ukraine crisis in 2014 provided a rare opportunity for Turkey to improve its strategic energy position. Turkey plays an important role in the big chess game of energy between Russia and Europe. On the one hand,Turkey is an important transit hub for the EU’s strategy of energy import diversification; on the other hand,Turkey also plays a key role in Russia’s aversion of energy transit risk and the stabilization of European energy markets. Improving energy status has a positive impact on the development of Turkey’s economic strength,the increase of its negotiating chips to the EU,and the expansion of regional influence. What cannot be ignored is there are a number of risks in Turkey as an energy transit country,which needs to be addressed by taking measures.

articles.title: 美国的乌克兰政策：战略目标及前景
articles.author: 杨双梅;
articles.abstract: Since the independence of Ukraine, the United States has actively carried  out diplomacy with Ukraine, gradually formed the strategic goals of securitization, democratization and westernization. The Biden administration’s Ukraine policy will continue the U. S. strategic goals, but will increase support for Ukraine to a limited extent, while maintaining engagement and containment with Russia, and seeking cooperation with European allies to urge stability and security in Ukraine. However, the inherent differences in U. S.-Ukraine relations have exacerbated the fragility of the bilateral relations. The attitudes of European allies will affect the effectiveness of resolving the Ukrainian crisis. The differences in the strategic goals of the U. S., Russia and Ukraine determine the instrumentality of Ukraine. Also,the four-party relationship between the United States, Russia, Ukraine and Europe will restrict the autonomy of Ukraine. It can be expected that the Ukrainian policy goals during the Biden administration will continue to adhere to securitization, democratization and westernization,but the implementation of its policies will still be subject to the above factors.

articles.title: 德国的重新武装与朔尔茨政府对俄外交的转折
articles.author: 吕蕊;
articles.abstract: After the Cold War, despite seeking international status as a world power,Germany was reluctant to rearm and continued to outsource its defense and security to NATO and the United States, creating an external image of a civil power that emphasized economic and trade relations and a commitment to conflict resolution. However,as the United States shifted its strategic focus from Europe and the Middle East to the Asia-Pacific, and with the outbreak of the Crimea Incident in 2014, Germany was forced to rethink the issue of rearmament and its contact policy with Russia. In February 2022, the Ukrainian Crisis led directly to the introduction of “watershed diplomacy” by the Scholz government, which led to a major shift in German diplomacy. Germany shifted from being reluctant to rearm to rearming, shifting its strategic orientation toward Russia from an accessible friend and partner to an adversary and enemy, and moving from being a civil power to a full-fledged one. Whether Scholz’s policy will go smoothly in the future, however, remains to be seen in the development of the Ukrainian Crisis, the situation in Europe, and the domestic political changes in Germany.

articles.title: 跨界民族、一体化与欧洲安全
articles.author: 顾炜;
articles.abstract: Germany has been reunified for almost 30 years;however,Europe is facing the adverse effects of the crisis in Ukraine,the refugee crisis and the like.The development and changes of events show that cross-border ethnicity has become an important factor that affects the security of Europe.The divergent opinions on the integration of cross-border ethnicity have led to the intensification of the crisis in Ukraine.Integration has both positive and negative effects on cross-border ethnic issues.The integration at the regional level helps to reduce the development gap between different ethnic groups and to solve cross-border ethnic issues,while the integration at the national or ethnic level may intensify conflicts and lead to changes of the borders.The future of European security depends on the development of regional integration to have a more positive impact on cross-border ethnic issues.

articles.title: 苏联解体后美俄管理核武器扩散的经验与启发
articles.author: 陶文钊;
articles.abstract: In the early 1990s,how to dispose the huge nuclear arsenal left by the Soviet Union after its collapse was a huge security challenge facing the international community.Both Bush and Clinton administrations were highly concerned for this issue.By establishing the Cooperative Threat Reduction Program（the Nunn-Lugar Project）and through repeated consultations and bargaining with Russia,Ukraine,Kazakhstan,Belarus and other countries,the U.S.finally made the countries such as Ukraine agree to transport the nuclear weapons from their respective territories to Russia to dispose,ratify the START I Treaty,and join the Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons as non-nuclear weapon states.These actions maintained the international nuclear non-proliferation regime and avoided possible nuclear proliferation.At the same time,the five permanent members of the Security Council also made security guarantees for Uzbekistan,Kazakhstan and Belarus,and the countries concerned have received economic compensation.

articles.title: 美俄《中导条约》履约争议与欧洲地区安全:影响与管控
articles.author: 蒋翊民;
articles.abstract: In July 2014,the disputes over the issue of the INF Treaty compliance were erupted between the United States and Russia. At the official level,the governments of the United States and Russia accused each other of breaching the treaty,and the diplomatic confrontation is escalating continuously. At the level of civil society,there are opinions in both the US and Russia demanding their government to withdraw from the INF Treaty,leading to an uncertain future of the continuity of the treaty.Despite the INF Treaty is a bilateral treaty for arms control between the United States and Russia,it is the issue of European security in essence. If Russia ’s land-based medium-range missiles do reappear in Europe,and Europe,they will pose a serious threat to European national security and even strategic stability. European countries lack of counter-measures to deal with land-based medium-range missile,and there is also an issue of lack of credibility as to how the United States will respond to the extended threats to Europe. In order to prevent this compliance dispute to continue to escalate,the relevant parties should refrain from taking escalating measures and use existing channels to seek to address the compliance disputes in the short term. And in the long run,in view of the complex security concerns of the parties behind the disputes over the INF Treaty,the relevant parties should make efforts to resolve the security concerns of each other,seeking to ensure the security and strategic stability in Europe.

articles.title: 东北亚地缘环境变化与“一带一路”推进的战略机遇
articles.author: 黄仁伟;傅勇;
articles.abstract: The geopolitical environment in Northeast Asia is undergoing historic changes,providing a new strategic opportunity for the advancement of the Belt and Road Initiative in the region.Achieving peace on the peninsula and implementing the systematic linkage of their infrastructures by the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea and the Republic of Korea is the primary prerequisite for this strategic opportunity.The full opening of the Russian Far East will provide a new space for the Belt and Road Initiative.The speedy signing of the China-Japan-South Korea Free Trade Agreement will lay the foundation for the new cooperation mechanism among the six countries.As a result,Northeast China will become the core area of the Belt and Road Initiative in Northeast Asia due to the revitalization plan.The United States will have to reconsider its strategic intent in Northeast Asia.
info: (G) Politics/ Military Affairs/ Law; (F) Literature/ History/ Philosophy; (J) Economics ＆ Management

articles.title: 叙利亚重建面临的政治、经济和外交挑战
articles.author: 王晋;
articles.abstract: This article attempts to understand the current situation in Syria from the perspective of historical process by comparing the political,economic,and diplomatic differences in Syria before and after 2011,when the Syria civil war broke out.Based on this,it analyzes and predicts Syria’s process of political reconstruction and its challenges in the future.Politically,the seven years’civil war have caused Syrian’s traditional authoritarian regime with a military-centered political system to be severely damaged,and the"centralized"political structure has been replaced by the political reality of the"decentralization"by armed separatists.Economically,Syria’s domestic economic situation is deteriorating further,the development model of diversified economy strived to promote by Bashar to after he took power has also been sluggish due to the war.In terms of its external relations,the civil war over the years has weakened Syria’s external influence,and Syria has also downgraded from a"regional power"to an object influenced or even manipulated by regional and extraterritorial powers.These new changes are the realistic basis for Syria’s post-war reconstruction and will also determine the general direction of future Syria’s internal affairs and diplomacy.

articles.title: 世界大变局下的东北亚地区合作:机遇与挑战
articles.author: 周锡生;
articles.abstract: The direction of Northeast Asian regional cooperation is currently an important issue in the background of profound changing world. As an important world economic center,the frontline of game between great powers and the core region of global geopolitics,Northeast Asia is characterized by complicated historical and national profiles,turbulent situations and long-standing intervention of extraterritorial forces,which present many specialties,sensitivities and risks. Northeast Asia should address some major issue: How to say goodbye to gloomy history,resolve the actual contradictions and conflicts,reshape the regional peace order and security relations and promote the building of"A Community of Shared Future for Mankind"in Northeast Asia. The great changes of the current world inevitably sweeps Northeast Asia and brings about major opportunities and challenges to regional cooperation. At present,the calls for peace has been louder,dialogues and exchanges have increased,and the atmosphere for cooperation has gradually turned for the better in Northeast Asia. A prelude to the re-establishment of regional order and security relations slowly resounds. China,Japan and ROK are promoting the construction of China-Japan-ROK Free Trade Area vigorously,thereby giving new impetuses for mutually benefit and win-win cooperation in Northeast Asia. However,dark side is still exposed by Northeast Asia against changing backdrop. There is an arduous and long way to promote regional cooperation and development of Northeast Asia.

articles.title: 媒介规范视野下美、德、俄三国的网络虚假信息治理
articles.author: 张慧敏;
articles.abstract: With the prevalence of internet media and digitalization in our society,we are facing strings of fast-moving,unwanted,false and bewildering information. Online disinformation is now becoming an increasing issue in the public sphere; yet the war against disinformation has just begun. On the one hand,the United States is burdened by the doctrine of marketplace of ideas,which leads to its inability to rebuild the legitimacy of the government on media regulation. On the other hand,Germany and Russia have taken actions to tackle the issue,but their explorations of regulatory boundaries and governance mode are far from complete while being pressured on domestic and international public opinions. From the perspective of policy analysis,the three countries have invariably re-examined the rights and responsibilities of technology companies and online platforms in supervision,but based on their different discourse atmosphere,the United States,Germany,and Russia have promoted their governance processes differently from the perspectives of democratic crisis,public values,and national security.
info: (G) Politics/ Military Affairs/ Law; (I) Electronic Technology ＆ Information Science

articles.title: 国际能源贸易中的争端管理机制初探——以俄欧乌天然气争端应对为例
articles.author: 程春华;张瑶;
articles.abstract: The energy dispute between Russia and Europe escalated with the Ukraine crisis. Russia and Europe have eased the energy relationship via the response mechanisms of energy crises such as early warning mechanism of energy crisis,international rules,and the tripartite talks. By analyzing how Russia and Europe dealt with the energy dispute,we know that peaceful settlement of disputes is a fundamental principle of responding to international energy dispute,while negotiation,investigation,mediation,reconciliation,expert determination,arbitration,judicial proceedings are its main approaches; the WTO law,the Energy Charter Treaty and other international law,and the European Energy Charter,the International Court of Justice and other international organizations,as well as international system composed of the conventions to deal with the dispute are its main tools. Countries should deal with international energy disputes by combining hard power and soft power,as well as political diplomacy and legal means,using "carrot and stick"to win the "smart power"and establish a comprehensive system of dealing with international energy disputes and maintain overseas energy interests.

articles.title: 沙特石油决策机制及其对美沙能源安全关系的影响
articles.author: 孙霞;
articles.abstract: The US-Saudi’s oil-for-alley alliance is not only a decision made by the US side,but also a series of political decisions made by Saudi Arabia,an oil producer and exporter,after considering various internal and external factors. These factors include the goals of economic interests in the great period of oil development,the anti-communist goals during the Cold War,the need to maintain regional stability after the Iranian revolution,and the need to stabilize the regime after the 9/11 incident. As one of the world’s largest countries in terms of crude oil reserve,Saudi Arabia’s decision-making mechanism for oil policy has profound international and domestic roots and has an important impact on the direction of the international energy market and the US-Saudi relationship of energy security. During the era of Salman and the Trump administration,the US-Saudi alliance is temporarily strengthened. In the future,this energy security relationship will continue to be maintained,but Saudi Arabia’s new round of oil policy changes will further touch the sensitive nerves of the relationship between the two countries. At the same time,due to the transformation of the US energy status,the internal division of OPEC,the "Vienna Alliance"formed among the non-OPEC countries such as Saudi Arabia and Russia and the renewed sanctions by the United States on Iran and other factors,the US-Saudi Arabia energy security relationship will face more tests.

articles.title: 论《联合国海洋法公约》争端解决机制中的“强制仲裁”
articles.author: 王佳;
articles.abstract: The mandatory character of the dispute settlement mechanism in the UNCLOS is reflected in the aspect of "compulsory arbitration",that is,when the parties to a dispute cannot make the same choice from the four dispute settlement modes,the procedure of arbitration will be initiated as the "residual method".Compulsory arbitration cannot be applied in all cases,however,restrictions has been imposed on it by the UNCLOS.Seen from the perspective of practice,it seems that "compulsory arbitration"is not favored among nations,especially when the arbitral tribunal greatly expands its jurisdiction beyond the provisions of the UNCLOS.Recently,some nations refused to participate in the compulsory arbitration,such as Russia in the Arctic Sunrise Case and China in the South China Sea Case.This is the biggest issue faced by the mechanism of "compulsory arbitration"in the near future.If the compulsory arbitration cannot go back on the right track mandated by the UNCLOS,it will face more challenges in the future.

articles.title: 叙利亚冲突中主权与人权原则的大国博弈
articles.author: 岳汉景;
articles.abstract: State behavior is determined by national interests,but state behavior is also affected by international norms. This is the case with the actions of the participating forces in the Syrian conflict,which are driven by interests on the one hand and influenced by norms such as the principles of sovereignty and human rights on the other.Although the participants in the Syrian conflict believe that the principles of sovereignty and human rights are both important and should be observed,in order to realize their respective interests well,they have shown different preferences for the two normative principles in their interaction: the interfering parties have shown a preference of“human rights principles take precedence over sovereignty principles”; anti-interventionists have shown a preference of “sovereignty principles take precedence over human rights principles”. In this way,the international normative question of “which is first,the principle of sovereignty or the principle of human rights”arises in the interactions between the two sides. This kind of interactive behaviors mainly includes: the struggle over whether to implement the “responsibility to protect”against Syria; the struggle over chemical weapons attacks in Syria; and the struggle over cross-border humanitarian assistance to Syria. In international struggle,it is of great significance for a country to accurately grasp the normative issues in the process of struggle to maintain the consistency of its international discourse and enhance its international discourse power.

articles.title: 全球金融公共品的武器化及其形成机制
articles.author: 周宇;
articles.abstract: The weaponization of global financial public goods in this article refers to the United States and Western countries implementing global financial public goods as weapons in international competition, and imposing financial sanctions on other countries. Such policies requires several pre-conditions. First, Western countries have the privilege in providing such global public goods. Second, the United States have such hegemonic power over global financial public goods, and is capable of requiring allies to “take sides”. Third, trends of globalization made it difficult for sanctioned countries to get rid of their high dependence on global financial public goods. Fourth,weaponisation of global financial public goods would bring political benefits to the West countries. The above conditions led the Western countries to weaponize the global financial public good as main policy tool for suppressing their geopolitical rivals.
info: (G) Politics/ Military Affairs/ Law; (J) Economics ＆ Management

articles.title: “依华”还是“抑华”:析越共十二大后的越南外交
articles.author: 张明亮;
articles.abstract: Based on an analysis of the diplomatic practice of the Eleventh Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam,this paper explores the diplomacy after the 12 th National Congress of Vietnam Communist Party. Stabilizing the relations with China and limiting China’s pressure and influence on Vietnam,will be the main line of Vietnamese diplomacy. The United States can contain China and in the South China Sea and it is strongly criticizing China on the issue of the South China Sea,which moves in line with the interests of Vietnam objectively,therefore,the Vietnamese diplomacy towards the US will be more active. The four neighboring countries contributed most to the Vietnamese efforts to "deter"China in the past five years,so they will still be the main objectives of Vietnamese diplomacy in the future to get more international forces that will be helpful to "deter"China. Vietnam will also "deter"the Chinese influence in its neighboring countries. Finally,it discusses several features of Vietnam’s diplomacy:（ 1） why treating the South China Sea like the East China Sea becomes a mainline Vietnam’s diplomacy;（ 2） the values of a favorable international environment and rich experience to Vietnam’s diplomacy;（ 3） why the relations of China and Vietnam with third countries are inversely related;（ 4） close economic ties do not imply close political relations;（ 5） pointing out Vietnam’s value is not high inany set of the bilateral relations with a discussion of Vietnam’s diplomacy.

articles.title: 土耳其在叙利亚危机中的困境:原因与前景
articles.author: 李游;王乐;
articles.abstract: Turkey’s domestic challenges and diplomatic predicaments are intertwined in the Syrian crisis.Turkey’s policy towards Syria is facing multiple predicaments such as the failure of the policy of overthrowing Bashar al-Assad,the emergence of the Kurdish militia in Syria by taking a ride with the trends,the backfire of the "Islamic State",the refugee problems,and diplomatic dilemmas.The very reasons are that the Justice and Development Party in Turkey is pursuing both Neo-Ottomanism and sectarianism,trying to reshape the order of the Middle East to compete for regional dominance by using Syria as a strategic fulcrum.The main internal causes include Turkey has misjudged the evolution of the Syrian crisis situation by overestimating its own strength and influence.The intricate gaming of extraregional powers and regional powers in Syria is the external cause that exacerbates the predicaments of Turkey’s policy towards Syria.For Turkey’s policy towards Syria to get out of the predicaments,it depends on the realist adjustments for diplomacy of the Justice and Development Party on the one hand;and it will also be influenced by the struggle of the United States and Russia in the Middle East,and the organizational factors of the Kurdistan and the "Islamic State" on the other hand.

articles.title: 土耳其未遂政变后埃尔多安内政外交的调整
articles.author: 李游;
articles.abstract: The failed military coup in July 2016 represents the culmination of Turkey’s domestic political power struggle. After the political cleansing and reform following the failed military coup,the process of re-Islamization in Turkey has been clearly accelerating,the military-political relations have reversed,the tutelary democracy has collapsed,the process of political reform with the presidential system as its core has accelerated,the situation in which the Justice and Development Party dominates is established,the social controls and the supervision of public opinion have been tightening,and the power of Erdogan regime has strengthened unprecedentedly. The failed military coup also led to the loss of the exemplary role of the Turkish Islamic democracy,worsening Turkey’s relations with the West,and stimulating Erdogan to speed up the adjustment of diplomatic direction to return to realism by mending the broken relations with Russia and actively improving relations with countries in the region to achieve a heterogeneous balance of foreign policy.

articles.title: 国际社会对保护责任支柱三的态度——基于因素+机制的初步分析框架
articles.author: 李丽;
articles.abstract: Overall,the Responsibility to Protect（R2P） has become a basic consensus of the international society,with different degrees of acceptance for its three pillars.The controversy is primarily concerning whether the Pillar Three can be accepted by the international society,especially by the permanent members of the UN Security Council.As to the normative process of R2P,the positive or negative attitudes of each country stem from some similar considerations,so a unified analytical framework might exist.In view of this,this paper attempts to give a preliminary analytical framework of factor+mechanism.The differences in countries’ attitudes towards the Pillar Three are rooted in their varied positions on sovereignty and the principle of non-interference.Therefore,there is a need to consider factors that affect countries’ attitudes towards intervention.These factors can be divided into the two areas:the possibility of countries to be intervened and the possibility of countries to intervene.The variables that affect the likelihood of being intervened are mainly national power and the extent of domestic fragmentation,while the factors that affect the likelihood of intervening are overseas interests and negative externalities.
info: China Politics and International Politics; International Law

articles.title: 试析新形势下欧美关系的发展前景
articles.author: 崔宏伟;
articles.abstract: In the context of the profound evolution of the international system and the changes in the security order in Europe,the relationship between Europe and the United States during the Obama administration was strengthened because of the common guidelines of liberalism and Atlanticism. Trump,the newly elected President of the United States,is giving a dissenting voice on the transatlantic security alliance,the trade relations between Europe and the United States,European integration and other topics from those of his predecessor,Obama,causing great concerns of the European allies about the uncertainty over European-American Relations in the future. In view of Trump’s idea of governing of "America First"and the elevation of the political influence of extreme rightwing across the Atlantic,the relationship between Europe and the United States will encounter the dominance of the interests of nation states,populism,market protectionism,and a crisis of multilateralism and many other challenges. The United States and Europe will make a pragmatic compromise on the burden-sharing in the security alliance out of their own consideration for long-term strategic and realistic needs,while liberalism retrogrades toward nationalism to varying degrees,and this ideological change will determine the prospects of the development of the relations between Europe and the United States.

articles.title: 中俄美关系与国际结构:从多极到两极?
articles.author: 赵华胜;
articles.abstract: Unipolarism has set the theme of the international structure in the early days of post-Cold War; it then gave way to the overwhelming multipolarism. However,the rise of bipolarism in recent years has posed challenges against multipolarism,wherein,the two poles refer to China and the US,and their basic indicator is defined by the economic aggregate. Nevertheless,bipolarism has not yet gained unanimous consensus as China still has incomplete aggregative indicator. The co-existence of bipolarity and multipolarity in subjective cognition and objective reality marks a unique phenomenon of today’s international structure,and their relations can be defined by a bipolar structure in a multipolar framework,or a multipolar structure with two dominant poles. This is a mirror of the complexity and contradiction of the international structure in reality,and the status will be maintained in the long run with a trend of forming stronger bipolar structure features. As one of the poles,China should be guided by the general theory and concept of multilateralism instead of multipolarism. Decoupled from any specific international structure,multilateralism enables China to remain unaffected by changes in its own status,align its diplomatic theory with varied international structures,and contribute to hold the theoretical basis of Sino-Russian international cooperation.

articles.title: 人类命运共同体引导下的区域合作实践——以“中朝俄韩”经济走廊建设对接“一带一路”建设为例
articles.author: 李永强;
articles.abstract: In the progress of the concrete practice of a community of common destiny for mankind,we must not only consider the concept clarification and the policy interpretations of a community of common destiny for mankind,but also implement them in China’s foreign engagement and the interaction between China and the world,in order to explain the realistic process and future trend of a community of common destiny for mankind.The key to interpreting China’s strategy towards Northeast Asia is that China’s own development,especially after the construction of the Belt and Road being proposed and promoted,provides a corresponding opportunity for China to implement the concept of a community of common destiny for mankind in the context of regional cooperation.For the specific process of linking the construction of the Belt and Road with the construction of the China-North/South Korea-Russia economic corridor,China can rely on the relevant ideas of the construction of the China-North/South Korea-Rus  sia economic corridor to exhibit the relevant layout and specific processes of China’s foreign engagement in the concrete practice of implementing the concept of community of common destiny for mankind.

articles.title: 中东形势出现两大新看点
articles.author: 刘中民;
articles.abstract: ＜正＞第一个看点是特朗普上台后美国的中东政策。目前很难看出特朗普中东政策的完整框架,很重要的原因是特朗普具体的中东政策主张之间相互冲突,缺乏内在逻辑性。但是,可以肯定的是,特朗普的特立独行并无法摆脱中东形势以及美国国内政治的制约。首先,在反恐政策和叙利亚政策上,特朗普一直强调消灭"伊斯兰国"组织的优先性,并暗示可能与叙利亚巴沙尔政权以及俄罗斯就打击"伊斯兰国"组织进行合作,其根本原因还是出于不愿因反恐问题卷入另一场战争的考虑。特朗普同时强调

articles.title: “一带一路”与中亚沿线枢纽国家发展战略对接思考
articles.author: 蒿琨;
articles.abstract: The successful advancement of the Belt and Road Initiative in the Central Asia depends on the policy communication and strategic docking between China and the Central Asian countries along the routes,especially the hub countries. Kazakhstan and Uzbekistan can be regarded as hub countries. By docking China’s Silk Road Economic Belt Initiative and Kazakhstan’s New Economic Policy named the Bright Road,China and Kazakhstan are expected to carry out intensive cooperation in the three fields of infrastructure,production capacity and finance. By synergizing China’s Silk Road Economic Belt Initiative with Uzbekistan’s Development Action Strategy,China and Uzbekistan are expected to carry out intensive cooperation in the fields of infrastructure,trade,investment and agriculture. The alignment between the Belt and Road Initiative and development strategies of Kazakhstan and Uzbekistan will not only propel the two countries to become the hubs of the Eurasian connectivity,but also help cope with the challenges brought by COVID-19 Pandemic to the economic cooperation between China and the two countries. However,it is also needed to invite Russia to jointly align the development strategy needs of the hub countries along Central Asian.

articles.title: 欧亚经济联盟的制度设计与“一带一盟”对接的模式与路径
articles.author: 韦进深;
articles.abstract: Eurasian Economic Union is an important institutional arrangement for regional integration. As a result of institutional design,Eurasian Economic Union is confronted with the challenges from a complex relationship between institutional legitimacy and effectiveness in the development course. This complex relationship not only restricts the development of Eurasian Economic Union,but also offects behaviors of Eurasian Economic Union. China and Eurasian Economic Union member countries have formed "5 + 1"Mode（ "Eurasian Economic Union + China"） and five separate "1 +1"modes（ "China + Members of Eurasian Economic Union"） in the practice of engagement with "The Belt and Union ". The"5 + 1 "mode explores the construction paths from the economic and trade agreement to the free trade zone,while the "1 + 1"mode developes the construction paths from project cooperation to engagement of national development strategy. Both mode and path have laid a solid foundation for engagement of "The Belt and Union".

articles.abstract: ＜正＞由上海社会科学院国际关系研究所与上海市对外文化交流协会共同举办的第三届淮海大国关系论坛于2015年11月22~23日在上海社会科学院小礼堂成功举行。本届论坛的主题为"失序还是正常权力转移——乌克兰危机后与南海紧张局势下的大国关系",来自美国、俄罗斯、法国、韩国、日本、意大利、比利时等国学者与复旦大学、北京大学、中国人民大学、外交学院、上

articles.title: 对接联动:丝路经济带利益链的构建
articles.author: 赵隆;
articles.abstract: At present,the construction of the economic belt of the Silk Road is in the assessment process of the projects,the rules,and the ways. The main affecting factors of building the interest chain are the changes in the external environment of the economic belt of the Silk Road and the presence of the gap between vision and reality of the countries along the Silk Road in terms of the Eurasian identity,the charisma of the pattern,and the driving force of the great power. The possible option of driving the economic belt of the Silk Road into the period of practice is to pay attention to the objective commonness of interests,the subjective construction,the realistic linkages and potential ties,the external challenges,and the cooperative cohesion with the "interest chain of the Silk Road"composed of individual,regional and multilateral interests to be built by the agenda,regional and industrial dovetailing and interlinking approach.

articles.abstract: ＜正＞在迎来一战100周年和世界反法西斯战争胜利70周年之际,上海市世界史学会、欧洲学会和俄罗斯东欧中亚学会联合举办了跨学会青年论坛"转型中的世界:大国关系与国际格局的演进"。社联学会处处长王克梅到会致辞,世界史学会副会长兼俄罗斯东欧中亚学会副会长余建华、欧洲学会秘书长曹子衡先后主持会议。华东师大历史系教授孟钟捷、上海社科院国际关系研究所副研究员李开盛、华东师大国际关系与地区发展研究院教授刘军、复旦大学国际关系与公共事务学院博士张骥、上海

articles.title: 经济全球化对新兴大国战略文化的影响
articles.author: 唐慧云;
articles.abstract: 当前国际体系转型不可避免地对大国的战略文化产生重大影响。国际体系转型给战略文化带来的新因素具体包括:影响战略文化的内外因素更加复杂化、多样化;协商和合作成为解决国际争端的主要方式;大国战略文化有趋同化趋势。在此背景下,新兴大国（金砖五国）的战略文化虽有不同的历史表现,但是基于共同的历史机遇和相似的国际地位,它们的战略文化具有类似性。经济全球化对新兴大国的战略文化的影响具体表现如下:一是改变了新兴大国过去重视意识形态的外交战略思维模式;二是致使新兴大国形成了与原有大国竞争、合作双赢关系的新模式;三是改变了新兴大国对国际组织的认知,并重视利用现有的国际机制平台来谋求国家利益。

articles.title: 跨里海国际运输走廊建设的进展、挑战与思考
articles.author: 蒿琨;
articles.abstract: The Trans-Caspian International Transport Route（TITR） starts from China,running through Kazakhstan, the Caspian Sea, the South Caucasus, overland to Turkey, also reach to other parts of Europe through the Black Sea. Since the escalation of the Russia-Ukraine conflict in 2022, freight traffic along the TITR has grown rapidly,making the TITR one of the alternative routes to the Northern Corridor. It is expected that by 2030, the freight volume through the Caspian Sea along the TITR will increase to three times its 2021 level, reaching 11 million tons. China’s participation in the construction of the TITR will contribute to high-quality Belt and Road Initiative cooperation, avoid geo-economic risks caused by geopolitical conflicts in the Eurasian continent to achieve the balanced and diversified development of the northern, central and southern lines of the China-Europe Railway Corridor. At the same time, the construction of the TITR also faces challenges such as cargo delays due to low transportation capacity, relatively backward infrastructure such as railways and ports, interruptions of cargo transportation due to climate change in the Caspian Sea, and differences in attitudes of stakeholders. China and the countries along the corridor can promote the construction of the TITR by improving the efficiency of multimodal transportation along the TITR, strengthening the electrification of railways and the construction of port transportation capacity along the TITR, jointly addressing impacts of climate change in the Caspian Sea, and stimulating the economic and social development of the regions along the TITR.

articles.title: 析依附“怪圈”背景下金砖国家发展的困境与出路
articles.author: 李亚宁;林少真;
articles.abstract: The growth rates among the BRIC countries have been on the decline since 2012,so those countries are facing a crisis of "color fading"and the development of the BRIC countries needs to be revisited.From the perspective of unequal relations among countries,the authors argue that the BRIC countries are still in a peripheral position in the international system and their development depends on Western developed countries.In order to get out of the dependency predicament,the BRIC countries must recognize the development difficulties such as the obstruction from the international community,a lack of technological innovation on their own,and widening wealth gaps within their borders.Therefore,they should strengthen practical cooperation in terms of enhancing the consensus on development,eliminating the influence of neo-colonialism and adjusting economic structure.As the "leader"among them,the role of China is crucial to the development of the BRIC countries.

articles.title: 印度“连接中亚政策”的战略评析
articles.author: 王志;
articles.abstract: As a rising power and a participant of the ancient Silk Road,India has launched a strategy of"Connect to Central Asia Policy,"hoping to connect with the Eurasian continent through Central Asia in order to develop relations and to promote economic and trade exchanges with the countries in the region.In terms of the path,India’s new strategy includes the two parts of hardware and software,the former is based on the construction of traffic and energy channels,the latter is manifested in the negotiation of free trade area and joining the regional international organizations.In terms of measures,India is promoting the South-North traffic corridors and TAPI energy channels,linking to the Eurasian Union,and joining the Shanghai Cooperation Organization.India’s new strategy has made some progress,but it is also facing some great challenges,its domestic issues,India-Pakistan relations,the situation in Afghanistan,Iran’s nuclear crisis and the dynamics of great powers’game in Central A-sia have a great impact on the strategy.

articles.title: 德国核威慑争论:背景、焦点及影响
articles.author: 周顺;
articles.abstract: The German debate on nuclear deterrence has long been considered a“phantom debate”. Germany has had little response to either the U. S. proposal for“extended deterrence”or the French proposal for European deterrent force based on France and Germany. Since the 21st century,a series of factors such as the transformation and upgrading of U. S. and Russian strategic nuclear forces,the geopolitical changes in Europe due to the 2014 Ukraine crisis,and the Trump administration’s threat to withdraw the nuclear umbrella from Europe have set the stage for a new round of nuclear deterrence debates in Germany since 2016. The debate has centered on how Germany and Europe can be secured assuming the loss of the U. S. nuclear umbrella.This comprehensive,public,and ongoing debate and media coverage is particularly rare in Germany,where the debate itself caused a “political earthquake”. Multiple“nuclear options”are under discussion: pan-European deterrence or European deterrence,indigenous German nuclear deterrence and maintaining Germany’s nuclear potential. The debate is an important attempt by Germany to play a more active role in building European security and defense,to break the nuclear taboo,and to “test the waters”for nuclear ownership. Following the outbreak of the Russia-Ukraine conflict,2022 has seen new developments in the German nuclear deterrence debate that may have significant implications for future European security.

articles.title: 2016年欧盟面临的挑战和机遇
articles.author: 叶江;
articles.abstract: This paper argues that it is difficult for Europe to completely solve the Ukrainian crisis and the refugee crisis in 2016,but both crises can still be controlled through the efforts of the EU and its member states. Meanwhile,responding to the threat of terrorist attacks will be the top priority for Europe in 2016. In terms of European integration,there is a good chance that the UK will hold the referendum on its membership of the European Union in 2016,but the results of the referendum are hard to tell. Regardless of the referendum outcome,it will have a considerable negative impact on European integration,although this does not mean that the EU will disinte-grate. It is worth noting that the economic situation in Europe is more sanguine in2016,the Greek debt crisis can be eased and controlled,and the EU’s GDP growth rate is likely to exceed 2. 1%. Looking forward,the outlook of Europe seems to show the sign of the early light of dawn.

articles.abstract: ＜正＞外交实践的发展和理论研究的创新,都需要国际关系学科培养更多的复合型人才。归结到教学方面,则需要在设置本科生的基础课程时,兼顾理论与实践两方面的需要。在这一问题上,我们的邻国俄罗斯有值得我们学习和借鉴的经验。

articles.title: “双钥匙原则”下亚欧会议扩大进程比较分析
articles.author: 朱天祥;
articles.abstract: To date,five rounds of enlargement of Asia-Europe Meeting（ ASEM） has been achieved. In addition to the general conditions,every candidate country must also comply with "two-key approach". In other words,every candidate country must at first obtain the support within its region,and then obtain the unanimous consent of all members of ASEM. In this process,EU and ASEAN play a key role in deciding on new membership. The entire enlargement process of ASEM can fall into three different categories: The first category is the membership admission of the respective EU members and ASEAN members. The second category is the process that Asian and European countries beyond the traditionally dominant regions of the EU and ASEAN join ASEM. The third category is the process that other countries with ambiguous regional identity join ASEM. Although ASEM is no longer a small-scale forum between the EU and the East Asia as both blocs,the EU and ASEAN have always been committed to maintaining the interregional characteristics of ASEM. In recent years, although ASEM has significantly slowed the pace of enlargement,under the new situation of Asia-Europe connectivity,a new enlargement process with more clear-cut directions and more distinct goals is worth looking forward to.

articles.title: 建立北极无核武器区的国际法分析与思考
articles.author: 唐尧;
articles.abstract: Two major security threats faced by the mankind in the 21 st century are the effects of environmental change and the hazard of nuclear weapons,and the Arctic area is experiencing such a test because of its unique geographical location. In2007 the Canadian Pugwash Group advocated for establishing an Arctic NWFZ（ nuclear-weapon-free zone）,attracting a wide attention from the world. Although the legal systems such nuclear arms control treaties and resolutions of the UN General Assembly provides a basis of international law to establish an Arctic NWFZ,the establishment of the Arctic NWFZ involves the conclusion and entry into force of a multilateral treaty,as well as the obligations and responsibilities of the participants and other issues. As a nuclear-weapon country in the northern hemisphere,China also has both international and domestic law basis for the participation in security governance in the Arctic. Based on this,currently we can refer to the existing experience such as the Treaty of Tlatelolco and the Treaty of Rarotonga to explore the specific ways of establishing the Arctic NWFZ from the two different perspectives of the Arctic and non-Arctic states.

articles.title: 中国南海岛礁建设与域外大国反应
articles.author: 邢瑞利;刘艳峰;
articles.abstract: From September 2013 onward,China began its staged construction on the islands and reefs in the South China Sea. In the meantime,Jane’s Defense Weekly in Britain and the Center for Strategic and International Studies in the U. S. published relevant photos,commentaries and reports in succession,causing widespread repercussions of the international community. According to their different national interests,extraterritorial powers responded differently at political,economic,military and diplomatic level. This paper attempts to explore the manifestations,causes and effects of the reaction of the five extraterritorial powers,i. e. the United States,Japan,Australia,India and Russia,and then propose appropriate countermeasures.

articles.title: 俄乌冲突下欧盟战略自主的推进困境:双层欧盟视角的分析
articles.author: 宋黎磊;常晨;
articles.abstract: The EU’s strategic autonomy has been a long-sought strategic goal with defense,economy,and technology. The Russia-Ukraine conflict has impacted the geopolitical landscape at the EU level,the international economic and trade system and security situation. On the one hand,the complexity of strategic game among the major powers caused by the Russia-Ukraine conflict has made the EU consider how to safeguard its own interests between China and the US. The Russia-Ukraine conflict has caused dramatic turmoil in the geo-security situation in Europe,and the US has taken the opportunity to strengthen its dominant position in European security and restrain the EU ’s strategic autonomy. Finally,the European economy has suffered multiple shocks and the risk of recession has increased. This series of chain reactions has widened the gap between EU’s own capabilities and the goal of strategic autonomy; at the level of the member states,differences old and new EU members have also affected the realization and development. Nevertheless,the Russia-Ukraine conflict has strengthened the EU’s determination to pursue strategic autonomy. EU’s strategic autonomy currently focuses on defense and economic security. EU should reduce the impact of the Russia-Ukraine conflict on EU’s industrial and supply chains. The EU continues to set strategic autonomy as a future strategic direction on which to base its internal and external policies and actions.

articles.title: 中东变局综论
articles.author: 余建华;汪舒明;罗爱玲;傅勇;孙德刚;戴轶尘;
articles.abstract: The upheaval in the Middle East since late 2010 is a phase product of the post-war nation-state building and the tortuous course of social development in the Middle East,the third wave of social and political changes after the nationalist revolution and the Islamic revivalist movement in the Middle East since the Second World War,and a regional manifestation of the major changes,major adjustments,and major developments of the global political and economic system in the post-Cold War era.The fundamental cause of this turbulent wave of the social and political changes in the Middle East stems from the internal structural conflicts in the modernization process of Arab countries.It not only has obvious characteristics such as suddenness,conductibility,and a domino effect,it also makes the Arab world in the Middle East into a sensitive period of social turbulence or a period more prone to political crises in which complicated and uncertain factors are evident.And they will continue to be so in the profound and difficult process of social transformation,developing in the general direction of"from changes,comes chaos;from chaos,comes governance"during the regional turmoil and pains.The changes in the Middle East over these years have had an important and widespread impact on regional politics and hotspot issues.Nowadays and in the years ahead,the balance of the strategic strength in the Middle East and the changes in international relations of the region are in a transition period in which they are from deconstruction,reconstruction to rebalancing.Facing the social and politic turmoil in the Middle East,major countries（groups）in the world,such as the United States,the EU and Russia,are actively planning their new Middle East strategies or making adjustments in relevant policies as well in order to be more favorable to maintain their strategic positions and interests in the Middle East.

articles.title: 失序还是正常权力转移:乌克兰危机后与南海紧张局势下的大国关系——第三届淮海大国关系国际论坛综述

articles.title: 新中国外交70年的国际环境变化:分期、演变和动力
articles.author: 王健;顾炜;
articles.abstract: During the 70 years of the establishment and development of the People’s Republic of China,the international environment has undergone profound changes by transitioning from the Cold War period of the US-Soviet confrontation to the multi-polarization period after the Cold War.The fact of increasing number and types of actors in the international environment,increasing complexity of international structure,and richer contents and fields of international topics shows developmental lines of the international environment that have gone from simple to complex and from fragmentation to integration.At present,the changes in the international structure have entered a critical period,the situation in which multiple processes coexist and compete will continue,and scientific and technological progress will continue to promote changes in the international environment.In the process of changing international environment,China is both an involved actor and an important force in promoting the changes of international environment.

articles.title: 跨国电网开发与地缘政治建构
articles.author: 张锐;相均泳;
articles.abstract: Transnational power grid is becoming an important energy carrier in the carbon-neutral era,and it can become a powerful tool for a country to shape a specific geopolitical order. According to the relational theory,this paper points out that countries can take the development of transnational power grid as a mode of relational operation,which could construct geopolitical relation in a particular region. There are at least three types of geopolitical relations constructed by transnational power grid: first,the network of political power,which creates a power grid dominated by one country and pursues the centrality of relationship; second,security network,which replaces the current power grid and pursues the security of relationship; third,communication network,which advocates new power grid construction and pursues the tightness of relationship. The impact of transnational power grid development on geopolitics is diverse,which may not only promote regional peace and stability,but also become a tool for individual countries to expand their power and court others． “Belt and Road Initiative”transnational power interconnection is a kind of “depoliticized ”cooperation,which does not undertake the intention or task of shaping geopolitics,but China should guard against the aggressive behaviors of other countries,and constantly enhance the openness and inclusiveness of cooperation.

articles.title: 复合机制模式:金砖机制建设的理论与实践方向
articles.author: 成志杰;
articles.abstract: A regime complex mainly refers to the complexity among the relations of mechanisms.Combined with the hierarchy and the forms of international mechanisms,such a regime complex can be designed as a model of a"mechanism of informal dialogue+formal binding mechanism",which has an important impact on the countries that are the main actors in international mechanisms.The BRICS mechanisms are in the process of institutionalization,in which a model of the regime complex is one of the important directions.In theory,a model of"informal dialogue mechanism+formal binding mechanism"for the BRICS cooperation mechanisms not only ensures the credibility of the mechanisms,but also maintains the flexibility of them.In practice,the establishment of the regime complex model of"informal dialogue mechanism+formal binding mechanism"realizes the unification of the theory and the practice of the institutionalization of mechanisms.The model of"informal dialogue mechanism+formal binding mechanism"is helpful to deal with the relations among the BRICS countries and the problem of the relationship between great powers and mechanisms,promoting the institutionalization and development of the BRICS cooperation mechanisms.

articles.title: “一带一路”战略与周边地缘重塑
articles.author: 凌胜利;
articles.abstract: The Belt and Road Initiatives is transformed into a strategy,an important strategy pursued by China for diplomacy in the new era. They have far-reaching geopolitical implications and will play a role in reshaping the peripheral geopolitics.From a geostrategic point of view,the strategy of the Belt and Road Initiatives will help China to expand the geo-environment,integrate the geo-political,security and economic factors,gain the geo-affection,strengthen the geo-relations,and release the geo-economic energy,playing a positive role in reshaping the geopolitics in the periphery. However,the strategy of the Belt and Road Initiatives will likely intensify the geopolitical competition among great powers in China’s periphery,increase the spreading of geo-risks among the countries along the lines,and trigger a linked movement of the internal and external forces of Tibetan separatists and East Turkistan separatists at the same time. In order to implement the strategy of the Belt and Road Initiatives more effectively and promote an optimization of the peripheral geo-environment,we should let the geo-economy to be dominated in terms of the operation of geo-factors while keep an eye on other geo-effects,reduce geo-risks on the principle of rule-based cooperation,and achieve a co-ordination of multiple geo-factors from holistic perspectives.
